text.section: The Commissioner shall adopt regulations to carry out this subtitle.

In addition to the requirements of subsection (a) of this section, the Commissioner shall adopt by regulation a requirement that each carrier provide a mechanism in a form and manner that the Commissioner may require to enable a member to:
be informed of the member's right to challenge a decision made by a carrier that resulted in the nonpayment of a health care service; and
access the Consumer Education and Advocacy Program in the Administration.
